title: Poster, 1979
medium: Offset lithograph on translucent tracing paper
inscribed: Imprinted in black, top: "PORTE-VOIX"/ "KEITH SONNIER".  At bottom,imprinted in black, starting from red square in curve: "ERIC FABRE".  Imprinted in black, diagonnally from lower left to center: "34 RUE DE SEINE".  Imprinted in black, bottom: " PARIS/ 18.10.79."
creditline: Museum purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment and Smithsonian Institution Collections Acquisition Program Funds
description: Art exhibition poster with French text (in electronic typeface), a black circle and a red square, and black border.  At top, between "Porte-Voix" and "Keith Sonnier" is a black circle; near bottom, a red square, from which arcs the name "Eric Fabre." The composition somewhat recalls a constructivist non-objective painting.

tombstone.epitaph: Poster, 1979. Offset lithograph on translucent tracing paper. Museum purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment and Smithsonian Institution Collections Acquisition Program Funds. 1999-45-26.
